verbs.description: unroof (third-person singular simple present unroofs, present participle unroofing, simple past and past participle unroofed)

entries.meaning: To remove a roof from, e.g. a building.
examples: Here Stuarts once in glory reigned, / And laws for Scotland's weal ordained; / But now unroof'd their palace stands, / Their sceptre's sway'd by other hands;
